thread.title: Putin warns the West with nuclear weapon showcase

title: Putin warns the West with nuclear weapon showcase
text:
Putin warns the West with nuclear weapon showcase 3:15pm GMT - 02:02 
President Vladimir Putin unveiled an array of new nuclear weapons on Thursday, in one of his most bellicose speeches in years, saying they could hit almost any point in the world and not be intercepted. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Vladimir Putin unveiled an array of new nuclear weapons on Thursday, in one of his most bellicose speeches in years, saying they could hit almost any point in the world and not be intercepted.
